tasks.label: Launch QEMU2
tasks.command: qemu-system-i386 -S -gdb tcp::1234 -no-reboot -daemonize -blockdev driver=file,node-name=f0,filename=./floppy_fat12.img -device floppy,drive=f0 -boot d -kernel isodir/boot/myos.bin -m 16 || exit 0

tasks.label: Launch test QEMU
tasks.command: qemu-system-i386 -S -gdb tcp::1234 -no-reboot -daemonize -blockdev driver=file,node-name=f0,filename=./floppy_fat12.img -device floppy,drive=f0 -boot d -kernel isodir/boot/test.bin -m 16 || exit 0
